title: Frontend Development Intern
description: Build responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Collaborate on designs, features, and performance optimization with experienced developers.

title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Design intuitive web and mobile interfaces using Figma and Adobe XD. Gain experience in user research, wireframing, and prototyping.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Work on data cleaning, analysis, and visualization using Python, R, Tableau, and Power BI. Apply predictive modeling techniques on real-world projects.

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Learn SEO, social media strategies, and ad campaigns. Gain hands-on experience with Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and analytics tools.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Collaborate on full-stack projects, write clean code, and debug complex problems. Gain exposure to languages like Python, Java, and frameworks like Django and Spring.

title: Graphic Design Intern
description: Design creative content, logos, and marketing materials using Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Canva.
